articles.title: Boston Globe editor Nancy Barnes to step down
articles.description:
Nancy Barnes, the editor of the Boston Globe, announced to staff Friday that she is stepping down from her role at the end of next week. In a note to the Globe newsroom, Barnes said she will stay on staff as an editor-at-large and hopes to work on a fundraising initiative focused on serving news […]

The post Boston Globe editor Nancy Barnes to step down appeared first on Boston.com.
